messages.title: Jobs, Equality, Sustainability
messages.content: Thangam Debbonaire is fighting for a fairer society and a more balanced economy with good jobs, a protected environment and equal treatment for all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promises to reduce waiting lists, recruit more GPs, and guarantee specialist cancer treatment within one week if cancer is suspected.
Plans to reduce class sizes, protect the education budget, and improve standards through collaboration between schools.
Commitment to fair pay and an increase in the minimum wage, promotion of living wage, and provision of regular contracts for those who want them.

Pledge to increase free childcare for 3 and 4-year-olds to 25 hours per week for working parents, and implement a legal guarantee for access to wraparound childcare from 8 am to 6 pm through primary schools.
A plan to end tax avoidance by closing loopholes, increasing transparency, and ensuring that everyone pays their fair share.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet suggests that a vote for Labour is a vote against the austerity measures imposed by the current government.

issues.economy: Fighting for a more balanced economy with good jobs.
issues.education: Plans to protect the education budget, reduce class sizes, and improve standards.
issues.health: Guaranteed specialist cancer treatment within one week if cancer is suspected.
issues.socialWelfare: Promotion of living wage and regular contracts for those who want them.

housing.content: Address the housing crisis and build more affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: A long, detailed personal statement is present, but the content is not visible in the image.
